name: SAVE RECORD
description: This command is used to save records to any file, TAS or non-TAS.
syntax: SAVE filename/@file_number NOCNF NOCLR GOTO goto_label ERR error_lbl

parameters.name: filename/@file_number
parameters.description: file_expr - Required - This is the name or number of the file that will receive the record.

parameters.name: NOCNF
parameters.description: Optional - The normal process is for the program to confirm that it is okay to save the record. If you do not want the program to confirm, include this option in the
